home-banner.paragraph: Your guests will enjoy high privacy and hassle-free use without any app downloads or links. Elevate your event planning today with us.

invitation.title: Want to see how your guest will receive the invite ? and how to track it ?

features.title: All you need to manage your events

accordion.title: No Links
accordion.contentTitle: No links, and bothersome pages to work with.
accordion.contentBody: The invitation will be sent directly to your guest's WhatsApp, and they can respond in chat.

accordion.title: Direct Location Sharing
accordion.contentBody: with a click of a button , the location will be shared , adding convenience for your recipients.

accordion.title: RSVP feature
accordion.contentBody: Miscalculation? Not a problem anymore! You will know who is attending and who is not, so you can manage your resources perfectly.

accordion.title: Unique QR code for each guest
accordion.contentTitle: unique QR code for each guest

customers.title: What our customers say about us

tesimonials.quote: A new and very sophisticated idea.
tesimonials.feedback: I enjoyed my experience with Mazoom. The invitations were so much easier!
tesimonials.author: manalq00 - Apple Store review

tesimonials.quote: The first choice for every occasion!‚úÖ
tesimonials.feedback: The idea is really smart, I have received more than one invitation from my friends‚Äô weddings through them. The process is very easy to deal with, and the best thing is that they have the reminder feature before the occasion for a few days to confirm all attendees and also the feature of sending the location. Really, the application saved us the trouble of searching for traditional cards and their high pricesüëçüèª
tesimonials.author: SaraKhalid97 - Apple Store review

tesimonials.feedback: The nice thing about it is the feature of accepting or rejecting, which lets you know who is attending and who is not üòç.
tesimonials.author: hayat121212 - Apple Store review

customers.accordion-header: All you need to manage your events

accordion.title: Automated sending
accordion.contentTitle: Send all your invites with a click
accordion.contentBody: your guests will receive invites Automatically through whatsapp

accordion.title: Know Exactly whos attending
accordion.contentBody: The guest can easily click on confirm or decline , and you will get the respond directly in Mazoom App

accordion.title: Advanced Tracking
accordion.contentBody: : Stay informed. Track if the guest received the message , read it and more .

accordion.title: More
accordion.contentBody: You can reply to any message through the app, and your guest will receive it from the designated invite number. Multiple options are available: change the invitation sender number, modify the invitation text, customize the login code design. and more , just contact US.
